author: Unity
description:
Loading scenes additively in Unity lets you optimize large levels by splitting them into smaller chunks. In this quick tip video, we show you how you can load just the parts that the player can currently see using additive scenes.

Learn more: https://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/SceneManagement.LoadSceneMode.Additive.html

Find more free Unity learn resources:
https://learn.unity.com/

#gamedev #unitytips #unity3d #unitylearn
title: Unity Tip Tuesday: Multiple scene workflow

author: Unity
description:
Alfonso Caparrini from Lapsus Games shares insights into how the studio's CG animation background shaped the distinct character lighting solutions in _NODE: The Last Favor of the Antarii._ Learn about their approach to preserving character readability in dark, atmospheric settings, and how they adapted film lighting techniques for real-time game development constraints.
